      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String Racer.spinWheelFortune(Wheel_of_Fortune wheel)
      Overrides the parent's method (class Player) so that the energy is doubled if the racer happens to spin the wheel of fortune.
      java.lang.String Player.spinWheelFortune(Wheel_of_Fortune wheel)
      This method sets the position of the player based on value obtained by the wheel of fortune
